title: Spacious 1bed 1bath NOW available! Apply Online today! 89102
posting_body: ['To further enhance and practice Social Distancing during this crisis, we encourage you to make an appointment with a member of our team.', 'We are offering in person tours 7 days a week between the hours of 9:00 AM – 5:00 PM.', "- We're here for you!", 'Shelter Cover Offers;', '• 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Jr. - 535 Sqft.', '• 1 Bedroom 1 Bath Standard - 700 Sqft.', '• 2 Bedroom 2 Bath - 1035 Sqft.', 'Apartment Features;', '• Fully-Appointed Kitchen', '• Espresso Cabinetry with Brushed Nickel Hardware***', '• Wood Vinyl Flooring***', '• Full-Size Washer & Dryer', '• Private Patio or Balcony', '•', 'Relaxing Roman Tub', '• Spacious Walk-In Closet', 'Community Features', '• Refreshing Pool & Spa', '• Amazon Hub Lockers', '• Fitness Center', '• Lighted Tennis Courts', '• Covered Parking', '• Clubhouse', '• On-Site Maintenance', 'Pet Policy', 'We accept cats and dogs; maximum is 2 pets per apartment.', 'Breed restriction for dogs', 'Shelter Cove Apartments', '2683 S Decatur Dr. Las Vegas NV 89102', 'Office Hours', 'Monday – Sunday', '8:00 AM – 6:00 PM']
